sentences.en: A man in the garb of a priest went onto the stage and stood there silently.
sentences.cn: 一名穿着牧师服的男子走上了台,并默默地站在那里.

sentences.en: Dr Zyphur's garb was, however, no provocative fashion statement.
sentences.cn: 然而, 塞弗博士的装束绝非张扬的时尚宣言.

sentences.en: He wore the garb of a general.
He wore the garb of a scout, not a general.
sentences.cn: 他身着童子军制服，而不是将军的制服。

sentences.en: It garb of a Golden A, as a veteran soldier.
sentences.cn: 它披着一身黄金甲, 像一位久经沙场的战士.

sentences.en: Once dry, Squeak preened his sparkling emerald - green garb.
sentences.cn: 刚一见干, “佳乐”就用嘴梳理起那身晶莹翠绿的羽衣来.

sentences.en: Postal carriers wore no uniform, but only ordinary peasant garb.
sentences.cn: 邮递员不穿制服, 只是普通农民的装束.

sentences.en: She doffs her garb worn under fire and wears again female attire.
sentences.cn: 脱我战时袍着我旧时裳.

sentences.en: She doffs her garb worn under fire And wears again female attire.
sentences.cn: 区别于制服、工作服和牧师服装的普通衣服.

sentences.en: The pushback resistance part of the Garb set bonus does not seem to be functioning.
sentences.cn: 战斗施法二件套的抵抗施法条被击退的效果并未生效.

sentences.en: Their Name, their Garb, and Work did so intoxicate and bewitch me.
sentences.cn: 他们的名气, 服饰和作品确实使我陶醉,令我着迷.

sentences.en: This lawful process coincidentally clothes life in a spiritual looking garb.
sentences.cn: 巧合的是,这一受自然规律支配的过程给生命披上了件貌似灵性的外衣.

sentences.en: Thus I assumed the splendid garb of the scholar - black mortar - board and black gown.
sentences.cn: 从此黑方巾、黑披袍的风光也被我占着了.

sentences.en: Whether a student or a teacher, standard dress for scholars was clerical garb.
sentences.cn: 无论学生还是老师, 学者的标准着装是牧师装扮.

sentences.en: Why, when she decks herself in the gayest coloring, do we don out soberest garb?
sentences.cn: 自然女生用最绚丽华美的颜色装扮自己的时候, 我们为什么还穿着最素净的衣裳?

trans.tran_cn: <正，幽>（尤指某类人穿的特定）服装，衣服，制服
trans.tran_en: a particular style of clothing, especially clothes that show your type of work or look unusual
